full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 92 of 261 1253 LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross 1 A. That's just what they asked of me. I didn't know what their tolerance was outside of that. 2 Q. So during the period of time that you were with them, you weren't snorting cocaine? 3 A. No. 4 Q. You just were able to go cold turkey during those periods of time; correct? 5 A. Yes. 6 Q. And afterwards, you went right back to your habit of using cocaine, using alcohol, using sleeping pills? 7 A. I was a periodic drug abuser. 8 Q. But nonetheless, your periodic drug use had a negative impact on your life, didn't it? 9 A. Yes. 10 Q. Enough to the point where you wanted to end that type of behavior so that you could go forward as a sober person? 11 A. Yes. 12 Q. Now you've testified that you met Ghislaine at her home on Kinnerton Street when you were 17 years old; correct? 13 A. I testified that I thought I was around that age, yes. 14 Q. And I think you said, when asked to do the math, that it was approximately 1994; correct? 15 A. Yes. 16 Q. And it was during that period of time, 1994 around the age of 17, that you went to Ghislaine's home with the red door SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018429

text_blocks.content: 1 A. That's just what they asked of me. I didn't know what their tolerance was outside of that. 2 Q. So during the period of time that you were with them, you weren't snorting cocaine? 3 A. No. 4 Q. You just were able to go cold turkey during those periods of time; correct? 5 A. Yes. 6 Q. And afterwards, you went right back to your habit of using cocaine, using alcohol, using sleeping pills? 7 A. I was a periodic drug abuser. 8 Q. But nonetheless, your periodic drug use had a negative impact on your life, didn't it? 9 A. Yes. 10 Q. Enough to the point where you wanted to end that type of behavior so that you could go forward as a sober person? 11 A. Yes. 12 Q. Now you've testified that you met Ghislaine at her home on Kinnerton Street when you were 17 years old; correct? 13 A. I testified that I thought I was around that age, yes. 14 Q. And I think you said, when asked to do the math, that it was approximately 1994; correct? 15 A. Yes. 16 Q. And it was during that period of time, 1994 around the age of 17, that you went to Ghislaine's home with the red door
